title: Bell Pepper
description: A perfectly ripe red or green bell pepper. Can be used to talk about bell peppers or food in general.
apple_vendor_description: The bell pepper emoji on Apple devices is a vibrant and appetizing representation of the colorful vegetable. Rendered with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading, its smooth, rounded form gleams under realistic lighting, showcasing its crisp texture.  Available in a spectrum of bright colors, this emoji is commonly used to signify healthy eating, cooking, fresh ingredients, or simply adding a pop of culinary flavor to digital conversations.
